articles.summary: Pi Coin recorded modest gains after Pi Network confirmed Protocol v23 deployment on its testnet. The upgrade places the Pi Coin's address book on the Pi Network's testnet, which is where it is currently located.    i.e. on Pi Network’s

articles.title: Beyond the Meme: Dogecoin's Evolution into a Legitimate Financial Asset
articles.author: The Call
articles.summary: Dogecoin is emerging as a legitimate financial asset. There are dedicated Dogecoin Exchange-Traded Funds (ETFs) and a surge in corporate interest in the DogeCoin. Dogecoins were once the poster child of speculative internet humor, but now they are more mainstream.

articles.title: Plasma to Launch Mainnet Beta Blockchain for Stablecoins Next Week
articles.author: Coin Desk
articles.summary: Plasma, a new stablecoin-based mainnet beta is set to be launched on September 25th. The network will debut with more than $2 billion in stablecoin liquidity. Plasma's mission is to become the foundation for global money movement and the beta is the next step in making that vision real.

articles.title: Bitcoin has 70% chance of hitting new highs in 2 weeks: Analyst
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: One analyst says BTC has a 70% chance of hitting new highs in the next two weeks. Data points to growing liquidity at $114,000, but it's not clear which path BTC will take first.    - BTC's market cap is currently at $1.2 billion.

articles.title: Dogecoin's Institutional Embrace: A New Era for the Meme Coin
articles.author: The Call
articles.summary: Dogecoin (DOGE) is undergoing a profound transformation. Institutional investors are buying Dogecoin. This shift is driven by strategic acquisitions from forward-thinking companies like CleanCore Solutions (NYSE American: ZONE) and the anticipated "buy the rumor, sell the news".

articles.title: Plasma eyes mainnet launch with $2b stablecoin liquidity and XPL token
articles.author: BTC Manager
articles.summary: Plasma's mainnet beta starts on 25th September. It's backed by $2 billion in stablecoins and support from over 100 DeFi partners. The debut includes the XPL token, designed to secure the network and give ownership to the community.

articles.title: Monero Received Nearly $1M Donations in 2025 for Development Funding and More
articles.author: Coinspeaker
articles.summary: Monero, a leading privacy-focused cryptocurrency, received nearly $1 million in donations in 2025 alone for protocol developments and other projects. Monero is a free, open-source software (FOSS) project that is maintained by its maintainers and users.
